    • Constructor Detail

      • Chessboard

        public Chessboard()
        This is the constructor. It automatically populates the chessboard with ChessSquares for either side, and prepares the chess game to be played

    • Method Detail

      • initializeSide

        public void initializeSide(int row,
                           java.lang.String color)
        This function initializes a given side's non-pawn pieces

        This function places a row of non-pawn pieces on the specified row of the board, all of the given color

        Parameters:
        row - Description: the row on which each of a color's non-pawn pieces will be placed
        color - Description: the color of which all of the pieces will be made on the specified row

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Converts the chessboard into a string representation
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Description: a String representation of the entire Chess board of the current game, formatted to act as the visual aid to play the game

      • getColorAvailableMoves

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getColorAvailableMoves(java.lang.String color)
        This function returns all possible moves of every piece of a given color. It is used to determine if there is a stalemate.
        Parameters:
        color - Description: Color of the team that a list of Available moves should be generated for ("b":black or "w":white).
        Returns:
        Description: Returns an ArrayList of the available moves of the specified team given the current positions of the pieces on the board

      • getColorAvailableCaptures

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getColorAvailableCaptures(java.lang.String color)
        This function returns all possible capturing moves of every piece of a given color. This is used to determine whether a king is in checkmate and whether a given move will move it into check.
        Parameters:
        color - Description: Color of the team that a list of Available captures should be generated for ("b":black or "w":white).
        Returns:
        Description: Returns an ArrayList of the available captures that can be performed by the specified team given the current positions of the pieces on the board

      • getBoard

        public ChessSquare[][] getBoard()
        This function returns the ChessSquare[][] chessboard The board of play for chess is made up of a two-dimensional array
        Returns:
        Description: Returns two-dimensional array containing all of the squares on the board, squares subsequently can have pieces. Therefore this method returns the current state of the running game of chess

        public ChessSquare getSquare(int i,
